description: Enterprise techniques used by LIGHTWIRE, ATT&CK software S1119 (v1.1)
name: LIGHTWIRE (S1119)

techniques.comment: [LIGHTWIRE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1119) can use HTTP for C2 communications.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge Part 2 January 2024)

[LIGHTWIRE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1119) can imbed itself into the legitimate `compcheckresult.cgi` component of Ivanti Connect Secure VPNs to enable command execution.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge January 2024)(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge Part 2 January 2024)
[LIGHTWIRE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1119) can RC4 decrypt and Base64 decode C2 commands.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge Part 2 January 2024)
[LIGHTWIRE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1119) can RC4 encrypt C2 commands.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge Part 2 January 2024)

[LIGHTWIRE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1119) is a web shell capable of command execution and establishing persistence on compromised Ivanti Secure Connect VPNs.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge Part 2 January 2024)
